text:
🗞️@BioNTech_Group has boosted the 2021 delivery target for its #Covid19 #vaccine to 2 billion doses, an increase from its previous projection of 1.3 billion, due to the addition of new production lines & as more doses can be extracted per vial.
➡️https://t.co/yYgNa9tu5u https://t.co/Q8oHOGfHvB
